citations.title: Arctic Sea Ice Prediction Based on Multi‑Scale Graph Modeling With Conservation Laws (IceGAT)

WeatherBench 2: A benchmark for the next generation of data‑driven global weather models

Arctic Sea Ice Prediction Based on Multi‐Scale Graph Modeling With IceGAT
